audioText: Je porterai toujours les conseils de mon grand-père dans mon cœur en suivant sa philosophie de vie.
question: What will I always carry in my heart while following his life philosophy?
options: Traditional family values passed down through generations
Inspiring life lessons learned from personal experiences
Moral principles developed through years of reflection
explanation: The text states 'Je porterai toujours les conseils de mon grand-père dans mon cœur en suivant sa philosophie de vie.' - I will always carry my grandfather's advice in my heart while following his life philosophy. 'Grand-père' means grandfather, 'porterai' means will carry, and 'conseils' means advice.
